name: Hands of Wisp
storyline: Inspired by Action RPG games. Hands of Wisp is simple. Progress through the maps and scenarios defeating the enemies that try to stop you while you try to discover your motivation. Throughout the game, discover the weight of protagonism and how important it is to all the beings in this universe.
summary: Control the Wisp Energy in an Action RPG, surviving the various unknown creatures and crossing maps and scenarios. Question together with Wisp how generic and empty your mission can be and what this whole universe means.
